name: GetPlayerNetworkStats
notes: This function may not return accurate data when used under OnPlayerDisconnect if the player has quit normally. It usually returns accurate data if the player has been kicked or has timed out.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3c R4 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Gets a player's network stats and saves them into a string.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player you want to get the networkstats of.

params_body.name: retstr[]
params_body.description: The string to store the networkstats in, passed by reference.

params_body.name: retstr_size
params_body.description: The length of the string that should be stored.
